validEmailValidation: Please enter a valid email address.
userNameCannotBeEmpty: Username must be at least 3 characters long.

userNotFoundMessage: User not found in the database, try with different credentials.
userWithEmailAlreadyExists: User with this email already exists
userPending: User is pending, please verify your email by clicking the link in the email we sent you.
emailVerificationMessage: Thank you for registering. Please confirm your email using the button below:
emailFooterNote: This email was sent by {{appName}}. If you did not request this, you can ignore it.
invalidOrExpiredToken: The verification link is invalid or has expired.
emailAlreadyVerified: This email has already been verified.
emailVerifiedSuccessfully: Your email has been successfully verified.
emailVerifiedMessage: You can now log in and start using the app.
emailAlreadyVerifiedMessage: Your email has already been verified. Just log in and start using the app.
emailVerificationErrorMessage: The verification link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new verification email.
userAccountSuspended: This account has been suspended, contact support for more information.
businessNameMinLength: Business name must be at least 3 characters long.
businessRegisteredSuccessfullyBody: Your business {{businessName}} has been registered successfully in {{appName}}.
businessRegisteredSuccessfullyText: A new business has been registered: {{businessName}}.
staffUserNotFound: User not assigned to this business
staffAlreadyExistsWithRoles: User already exists with these roles
staffRoleNotFound: The specified role was not found for this user.
openingHoursDayNotFound: Opening hours for this day were not found
dayAlreadyExists: That day already has opening hours
categoryNameValidation: Category name must be at least 3 characters long.
productTitleMinLength: Product title must be at least 3 characters long.
productDescriptionCannotBeEmpty: Product title must be at least 5 characters long.
productPriceMinimum: Product price must be at least 0.
countInStockCannotBeEmpty: Count in stock must be at least 0.
productRatingCountMinimum: Product rating count must be at least 0.
accessDeniedOwnOrdersOnly: You can only view your own orders
orderItemsRequired: Order items are required and must be an array
shippingDetailsRequired: Shipping details, phone number, and address are required
shippingPriceMustBeAtLeast0: Shipping price must be at least 0
orderItemValidation: Each order item must have product, quantity, and price
invalidStatus: Invalid status. Status must be 'pending', 'process', 'shipped', 'delivered', or 'cancelled'.
orderInvalidStatusTransition: Invalid status transition from '{{from}}' to '{{to}}', must be this secuence: 'pending' -> 'process' -> 'shipped' -> 'delivered'
orderAlreadyHasTheStatus: Set the same status is not allowed
ordersCanOnlyBeCancelledByMerchantOrBuye: Only merchant and buyer can cancel orders
orderStatusUpdatedSuccessfullyNotificati: {{name}}, your order id: {{orderId}} has been updated to: {{status}}. Thank you for shopping with {{businessName}}.
userCanOnlyCancelPendingOrders: The order you're trying to cancel is not pending
orderCreatedBody: Your order has been successfully created on {{appName}}.
orderCreatedFooter: You will receive a notification when each business updates your order status.
nameLengthError: Name must be between 2 and 100 characters.
deliveryMethodInvalid: Invalid delivery method. Must be delivery or pickup.
priceInvalid: Price must be a positive number.
orderNotReadyToAssign: This order is not ready for shipment.
orderStatusNotForAssign: Not allowed, the order status is: {{status}}.
notDeliveryManActive: There are no active delivery staff members for this business.
deliveryManNotRegistered: Selected user is not registered as delivery staff of this business.
